Heavenly Winds.description: Grant Shield to Janna and the lowest Health ally for 4 seconds. Then, deal magic damage to the 2 nearest enemies

Dragonlord.description: After 8 seconds of combat, the Dragon strikes the board, dealing true damage to enemies and granting all allies Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
Dragonlord.increase: 2 5% Health damage, 12% Attack Speed. 3 10% Health damage, 18% Attack Speed. 4 12% Health damage, and Stuns for 1.5 seconds. 5 18% Health damage, 45% Attack Speed.

Invoker.description: Every 3 seconds, your units gain Mana.
Invoker.increase: 2 5 Mana to all allies. 4 20 Mana to Invokers; 5 Mana to others. 6 35 Mana to Invokers. 20 Mana to others
